Delicious food, excellent champagne & wines, and quite a few smiling faces!!

Recently spent the evening with the ever entertaining Elton Slone @eltonslone2 of Robert Craig Winery and his lovely wife Shelly @shellbelle_sf .  Delicious Chinese food, an amazing range of champagne and wines, and the best of friends.  I’ve been enjoying Robert Craig wines for a long time now, I still have plenty stashed away, and will be looking to restock soon! — @robertcraigwinery — 
/* 
2021 Robert Craig Chardonnay, Gap’s Crown, Sonoma County 
2014 Robert Craig Cabernet, Mt Veeder 
2014 Robert Craig Cabernet, Howell Mountain 
/*

1982 Bersano Roserva Barolo

2009 Domaine Rostaing, Cote-Rotie La Landonne

2017 Rose & Arrow, Yamhill Close 
/*
/*

social_posts.post_text:
One of our favorite restaurants in Las Vegas is Bazaar Meat by José Andrés, great cuisine & amazing service.  Thanks Roy @vvvroyvvv & Shaun @shaun.lee.9847 for taking care of us, the wine pairing was a fun added touch to the night!  Hope to see Matt @uehara31next time! ... @chefjoseandres @joseandresgroup #bazaarmeat @saharalasvegas — @shafervineyards @elias_fernandez_winemaker —

This was a recent dinner, James @winecatla finally got his neck brace off so he wanted to get out and celebrate a little. Our usual hangout, Hop Woo, was closed for some reason so we ended up at Cafe Istanbul in #beverlyhills @cafeistanbulbh — Delicious Mediterranean cuisine!! We need to go back again!! Maybe my wine glass is still there! ☺️🍷 — Enjoyed some excellent Champagne and Cabernets!

Good to see Bryan @bjudice001 & Aimee @aimeejudice, although it so happened I just saw them the week before, but prior to that we hadn’t seen them in several years! Good Chinese food, amazing wines, and the best of friends! — 🙏 all for sharing some amazing wines! —

With a heavy heart, I share the news that my Mom passed away late afternoon on Monday, July 10th. She was 93 and, even while in hospice, remained in the comfort of my sister Kat’s home in Bellevue, WA, where both my sisters Kat & Susan cared for her.  I was fortunate to be by her side as she passed peacefully.
 My sisters and family had been in Scotland for my nephew Eric and Meredith’s long-planned wedding. I came up to help care for my Mom and nephew’s pets while everyone was in Scotland.  We all believe Mom waited until she knew I was there (from July 4th), and everyone were all on their way/or already in Scotland.
 My Mom had a long and fulfilled life, and for that, we are grateful. We are honoring her request for no funeral service, so we’re just working out plans to get her to Los Angeles, where her ashes will join my Dad’s.
 We were quietly letting family & friends know, and the last was my nephew, once they returned (Monday), as we didn’t want to spoil the wedding celebration for them.
 I miss my Mom 😔❤️...but I take comfort in knowing she is at peace and with my Dad… 
/*
/* 
#rip #love #loveyou #loveyoumom❤️ #missyou #thankyou #thankful #grateful #peaceful #mom #restinpeace 07.10.2023 —

We talked about going to Mother Wolf for a while and it finally happened last Saturday.  The 3rd LA restaurant Chef Evan Funke has opened in LA (Felix, Funke & Mother Wolf). I’ve been to Felix, & now Mother Wolf, and Funke coming up just before Christmas. Still delicious Italian cuisine but more focused on Roman classics such as carbonara, pasta alla Gricia, arrabiata, porchetta, grilled meats and fried artichokes, though you will find some same dishes as Felix such as Cacio e Pepe or Margherita Pizza — As always, it was great to see Matt, Reema & Sharon— 
/* 
As usual, the night starts with champagne - 2008 Rare Champagne @rarechampagne_official — then…

2021 Haynes Vineyard, Forgeron, Pinot Noir — Just amazing! @carltonmccoy @haynesvineyardnapa — 

and…2013 Giuseppe e Figlio Mascarello - Monprivato Barolo — Beautiful! 🙏 Matt & Reema! — #giuseppemascarello 
/*
